enhanced_description: Zoho offers a comprehensive suite of over 55 products designed to help businesses, particularly large enterprises, manage diverse functions including sales, marketing, support, collaboration, finance, and recruitment. With over 100 million users worldwide, Zoho provides a unified cloud software solution, known as Zoho One, intended to serve as an 'Operating System for Business' to break down departmental silos and increase organizational efficiency. A key differentiator is Zoho's strong commitment to user privacy, operating without an ad-revenue model, even for its free products. Its extensive Zoho Marketplace further enhances functionality with over 2000 ready-to-use extensions across 40+ categories, allowing users to connect their favorite business tools.
